title.rendered: Classic Literature… and Lots of It!

content.rendered:
All Gottwals Books locations are stocking up on thousands of copies of some of the greatest works of literature.  These books are brand new and sell for $2.97-$3.97!

Titles include works by Austen, the Brontes, Carroll, Shelly, and more.
